Cece FowlerDear Friends of Cece Fowler We are very sorry to let you know that Cece Fowlers mother passed away on Wednesday night November th after a brief illness Cece and Mack are in California with the other family members In lieu of flowers the family has requested that donations be made to Womens Recovery of California Yellowstone in memory of Audrey Bishop Cotton E Bay Street Costa Mesa CA At this time we have no other information Cece had planned to be on vacation next week so we expect her back in the office no sooner than November th Shirley Platt Scenic Texas Inc fax
